00025 Field::Field(QDomNode& fieldNode): id_(), name_(), displayName_(),
00026 description_(), bitOffset_(-1), typeIdentifier_(), bitWidth_(0),
00027 bitWidthAttributes_(), enumeratedValues_(), parameters_() {
00028 
00029         // parse the spirit:id attribute
00030         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = fieldNode.attributes();
00031         id_ = attributeMap.namedItem("spirit:id").nodeValue();
00032         id_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(id_);
00033 
00034         // go through all nodes and parse them
00035         for (int i = 0; i < fieldNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00036                 QDomNode tempNode = fieldNode.childNodes().at(i);
00037 
00038                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:name")) {
00039                         name_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00040                         name_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(name_);
00041                 }
00042                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:displayName")) {
00043                         displayName_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00044                 }
00045                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:description")) {
00046                         description_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00047                 }
00048                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:bitOffset")) {
00049                         bitOffset_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue().toInt();
00050                 }
00051                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:typeIdentifier")) {
00052                         typeIdentifier_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00053                         typeIdentifier_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(typeIdentifier_);
00054                 }
00055                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:bitWidth")) {
00056                         bitWidth_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue().toInt();
00057                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, bitWidthAttributes_);
00058                 }
00059                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:enumeratedValues")) {
00060 
00061                         // parse each enumerated value
00062                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00063                                 QDomNode enumeratedNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00064 
00065                                 enumeratedValues_.append(QSharedPointer<EnumeratedValue>(
00066                                                 new EnumeratedValue(enumeratedNode)));
00067                         }
00068                 }
00069                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:parameters")) {
00070 
00071                         // parse each parameter
00072                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00073                                 QDomNode parameterNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00074 
00075                                 parameters_.append(QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00076                                                 new Parameter(parameterNode)));
00077                         }
00078                 }
00079         }
00080 
00081         // if mandatory name is missing
00082         if (name_.isNull()) {
00083                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory name is missing in spirit:"
00084                                 "field"));
00085         }
00086 
00087         // if mandatory bitOffset is missing
00088         if (bitOffset_ < 0) {
00089                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory bitOffset is missing in"
00090                                 "spirit:field"));
00091         }
00092 
00093         // if mandatory bitWidth is missing
00094         if (bitWidth_ <= 0) {
00095                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory bitWidth missing in spirit:"
00096                                 "field"));
00097         }
00098 
00099         return;
00100 }

00102 Field::Field( const Field& other ):
00103 id_(other.id_),
00104 name_(other.name_),
00105 displayName_(other.displayName_),
00106 description_(other.description_),
00107 bitOffset_(other.bitOffset_),
00108 typeIdentifier_(other.typeIdentifier_),
00109 bitWidth_(other.bitWidth_),
00110 bitWidthAttributes_(other.bitWidthAttributes_),
00111 enumeratedValues_(),
00112 parameters_() {
00113 
00114         foreach (QSharedPointer<EnumeratedValue> enumValue, other.enumeratedValues_) {
00115                 if (enumValue) {
00116                         QSharedPointer<EnumeratedValue> copy = QSharedPointer<EnumeratedValue>(
00117                         new EnumeratedValue(*enumValue.data()));
00118                         enumeratedValues_.append(copy);
00119                 }
00120         }
00121 
00122         foreach (QSharedPointer<Parameter> param, other.parameters_) {
00123                 if (param) {
00124                         QSharedPointer<Parameter> copy = QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00125                                 new Parameter(*param.data()));
00126                         parameters_.append(copy);
00127                 }
00128         }
00129 }

00131 Field& Field::operator=( const Field& other ) {
00132         if (this != &other) {
00133                 id_ = other.id_;
00134                 name_ = other.name_;
00135                 displayName_ = other.displayName_;
00136                 description_ = other.description_;
00137                 bitOffset_ = other.bitOffset_;
00138                 typeIdentifier_ = other.typeIdentifier_;
00139                 bitWidth_ = other.bitWidth_;
00140                 bitWidthAttributes_ = other.bitWidthAttributes_;
00141 
00142                 enumeratedValues_.clear();
00143                 foreach (QSharedPointer<EnumeratedValue> enumValue, other.enumeratedValues_) {
00144                         if (enumValue) {
00145                                 QSharedPointer<EnumeratedValue> copy = QSharedPointer<EnumeratedValue>(
00146                                         new EnumeratedValue(*enumValue.data()));
00147                                 enumeratedValues_.append(copy);
00148                         }
00149                 }
00150 
00151                 parameters_.clear();
00152                 foreach (QSharedPointer<Parameter> param, other.parameters_) {
00153                         if (param) {
00154                                 QSharedPointer<Parameter> copy = QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00155                                         new Parameter(*param.data()));
00156                                 parameters_.append(copy);
00157                         }
00158                 }
00159         }
00160         return *this;
00161 }

00163 Field::~Field() {
00164         enumeratedValues_.clear();
00165         parameters_.clear();
00166         bitWidthAttributes_.clear();

00169 void Field::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00170         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:field");
00171 
00172         // if spirit:id attribute is defined
00173         if (!id_.isEmpty()) {
00174                 writer.writeAttribute("spirit:id", id_);
00175         }
00176 
00177         // if mandatory name is not defined
00178         if (name_.isEmpty()) {
00179                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory name missing in spirit:"
00180                                 "field"));
00181         }
00182         else {
00183                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:name", name_);
00184         }
00185 
00186         // if optional displayName is defined
00187         if (!displayName_.isEmpty()) {
00188                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:displayName", displayName_);
00189         }
00190 
00191         // if optional description is defined
00192         if (!description_.isEmpty()) {
00193                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:description", description_);
00194         }
00195 
00196         // if mandatory bitOffset is not defined
00197         if (bitOffset_ < 0) {
00198                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory bitOffset missing in spirit:"
00199                                 "field"));
00200         }
00201         else {
00202                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:bitOffset",
00203                                 QString::number(bitOffset_));
00204         }
00205 
00206         // if optional typeIdentifier is defined
00207         if (!typeIdentifier_.isEmpty()) {
00208                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:typeIdentifier", typeIdentifier_);
00209         }
00210 
00211         // if mandatory bitWidth is not defined
00212         if (bitWidth_ <= 0) {
00213                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory bitWidth missing in spirit:"
00214                                 "field"));
00215         }
00216         else {
00217                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:bitWidth");
00218 
00219                 General::writeAttributes(writer, bitWidthAttributes_);
00220                 writer.writeCharacters(QString::number(bitWidth_));
00221 
00222                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:bitWidth
00223         }
00224 
00225         // if optional enumeratedValues exist
00226         if (enumeratedValues_.size() != 0) {
00227                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:enumeratedValues");
00228 
00229                 for (int i = 0; i < enumeratedValues_.size(); ++i) {
00230                         enumeratedValues_.at(i)->write(writer);
00231                 }
00232 
00233                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:enumeratedValues
00234         }
00235 
00236         // if optional parameters exist
00237         if (parameters_.size() != 0) {
00238                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:parameters");
00239 
00240                 for (int i = 0; i < parameters_.size(); ++i) {
00241                         parameters_.at(i)->write(writer);
00242                 }
00243 
00244                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:parameters
00245         }
00246 
00247         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:field
00248 }
